name.jp: 魔力ドリンクゴールド

description.en: A curious blue potion that grants the imbiber unlimited MP for a limited time. Last 1 hour.
description.ar: A curious blue potion that grants the imbiber unlimited MP for a limited time. Last 1 hour.
description.br: Uma curiosa poção azul que concede ao consumidor Mana ilimitada durante 1 hora.
description.cns: MP在1小时内维持饱满状态。
description.de: Ein seltsamer blauer Trank, der dir unbegrenzte MP verleiht. Hält 1 Stunde.
description.fi: A curious blue potion that grants the imbiber unlimited MP for a limited time. Last 1 hour.
description.fil: A curious blue potion that grants the imbiber unlimited MP for a limited time. Last 1 hour.
description.fr: Une fiole bleue étrange vous donnant des PM infinis pendant 1 heure.
description.id: Ramuan biru penasaran yang memberikan MP tak terbatas yang menyerap untuk waktu yang terbatas. 1 jam terakhir.
description.it: A curious blue potion that grants the imbiber unlimited MP for a limited time. Last 1 hour.
description.jp: 不思議な青いポーションで、飲んだ者は一時的にMPが無制限になる。持続時間は1時間。
description.kr: 사용자에게 제한된 시간 동안 MP를 무한으로 사용할 수 있게 해주는 특이한 파란 포션 입니다. 1시간 동안 지속됩니다.
description.nl: A curious blue potion that grants the imbiber unlimited MP for a limited time. Last 1 hour.
description.pl: Niebieska mikstura dająca pijącemu nielimitowane PM na czas 1 godziny.
description.ru: A curious blue potion that grants the imbiber unlimited MP for a limited time. Last 1 hour.
description.sp: Una curiosa poción azul que otorga MP ilimitados al que la toma por un tiempo limitado. Dura 1 hora.
description.sw: A curious blue potion that grants the imbiber unlimited MP for a limited time. Last 1 hour.
description.th: ยาสีน้ำเงินขี้สงสัยที่ให้ MP แก่ผู้ดื่ม ระยะเวลา 1 ชม.
description.tw: MP 在1小時內維持飽滿狀態。
description.vi: Một lọ thuốc màu xanh lam gây tò mò cung cấp lượng MP không giới hạn cho cơ thể trong một thời gian giới hạn. Trong 1 giờ.
